${ModID}:Demolish.NAME: Demolish
${ModID}:Demolish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add a *Loose *Brick into your draw pile.

${ModID}:HastyConstruction.NAME: Hasty Construction
${ModID}:HastyConstruction.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Loose *Brick into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Crenellations.NAME: Crenellations
${ModID}:Crenellations.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Startup: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:LeaningTower.NAME: Leaning Tower
${ModID}:LeaningTower.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Startup: At the end of !${ModID}:m2! turns, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:PerfectedBrick.NAME: Perfected Brick
${ModID}:PerfectedBrick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your ${ModID}:Bricks.

${ModID}:Jenga.NAME: Jenga
${ModID}:Jenga.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the start of your turn, Exhaust a random ${ModID}:Brick or die.

${ModID}:BrickGolem.NAME: Brick Golem
${ModID}:BrickGolem.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain !M! Metallicize, !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity, and !${ModID}:m2! Artifact. NL Pickup: Obtain 2 *Heavy *Brick.

${ModID}:Salvage.NAME: Salvage
${ModID}:Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Discard the first !M! ${ModID}:Bricks in your draw pile.
